page.title: 03CUSTOMS
page.content: The first{Custom }is the {Het Pint , which involves the donation of mulled ale and fifty pence to a group of deserving pensioners.The ale is also distributed to those prepared to get up early on New year's Day.The next major custom is that of {Whipputy {Scourie},which takes place on March 1st.This tradition is supposed to have originated with battles between the boys of New Lanark and Lanark.Nowdays boys race around St Nicholas' church hitting each other with paper balls.The most important tradition of all is the {Lanimers}which takes place at the beginning of June.This ancient festival begins with the perambulation of the Marches on Monday and Wednesday.On Monday a new Lord Cornet is invested.THe climax is on Thursday with the crowning of the Lanimer Queen and the procession of tableaux.
